# Erlang

> Erlang distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var erlang = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/erlang' );
```

#### erlang

Erlang distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = erlang;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
